text:
I’ve seen a few people confused about how to get more info on the errors during auto-precomp that don’t throw and show stack traces. I’m thinking we need a little text there to prompt what to do.. Something like this?

`Either call pkg> precompile, or load the package to get the full error report`

elements.text: I’ve seen a few people confused about how to get more info on the errors during auto-precomp that don’t throw and show stack traces. I’m thinking we need a little text there to prompt what to do.. Something like this?
